body:
Comment 3 by **ghexsel**: 
I did something similar, tried having 2 programs, an importer receiver and an 
exporter sender.  

Exporter sends 10 entries then closes the channel and terminates.

The last value doesn't get to the client (9 appear to be received) unless you add 
some printf or other statement to delay the server's termination.

Maybe we need a "flush" function?
